articles.title: EE.UU. sanciona a dos personas y tres empresas vinculadas a Corea del Norte
articles.content:

articles.author: RT
articles.title: Sweden ends sweeping ‘automatic asylum’ policy for Syrians
articles.description: Stockholm has tightened its lenient migration laws with regard to Syrian asylum-seekers, saying that not all parts of the war-torn country are equally dangerous anymore. Read Full Article at RT.com
articles.content:
Since the intensity of the war in Syria “has slightly decreased,” the new asylum-seekers “will not automatically be granted protection in Sweden” any longer, the Swedish Migration Agency said on Thursday.
From now on, officials will assess each Syrian asylum… [+1298 chars]

articles.description: Beijing told visiting Philippine President Rodrigo Duterte that its position on the South China Sea was not up for negotiation, Manila’s spokesman said on Friday.
articles.content:
Beijing told visiting Philippine President Rodrigo Duterte that its position on the South China Sea was not up for negotiation, Manila’s spokesman said on Friday.

articles.title: US Fed ‘unable to delay’ recession any longer – investor Peter Schiff
articles.description: There is no question the US economy is heading toward recession, according to Peter Schiff, chief global strategist at Euro Pacific Capital. He says it was a “huge mistake” for the Federal Reserve to cut interest rates last month. Read Full Article at RT.com
articles.content: “They never should have taken rates to zero in 2008 and held them there for 7 years,” the veteran broker told RT. “Zero interest rates and quantitative easing have created problems in our economy that will take generations to fix. However, the healing will ne… [+1196 chars]

articles.title: Científicos españoles hallan una segunda mutación genética resistente al VIH
articles.description: Una familia española afectada por una rarísima enfermedad porta una inmunidad natural contra el virus del sida distinta a la del conocido como 'paciente de Berlín'.
articles.content: Una mutación genética que provoca una rarísima enfermedad muscular evita que el sistema inmune del ser humano se infecte con el virus de inmunodeficiencia humana (VIH) que genera el sida, de acuerdo con un nuevo estudio que investigadores españoles han public… [+1710 chars]
